REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0633 reute d f BC-HEALTHVEST-<HVT>-SELL 03-04 0055

TEXT.TITLE: HEALTHVEST <HVT> SELLS SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Healthvest, a Maryland real estate investment trust, said it began selling five mln shares of common stock at 21 dlrs a share. The company said it is also selling 543,237 shares to Healthcare International Inc <HII>, giving the company a 9.8 pct stake in Healthvest. Reuter
